name: js-to-sql-formula-compiler
description: JavaScript-based Excel-like formula compiler that converts formulas to PostgreSQL SQL

scripts.exec-all:
echo '# Formula Execution Results
' > exec-results.md && echo '## Merchant Table Formulas
' >> exec-results.md && ./exec-formula --output markdown examples/table/merchant/*.formula >> exec-results.md && echo '
## Submission Table Formulas
' >> exec-results.md && ./exec-formula --output markdown examples/table/submission/*.formula >> exec-results.md
